title: Fairy tales - source of most stories

content.description: Directions: You will now listen to a lecture of about nine minutes duration on the topic Das M채rchen. If you wish, you may take notes. At the end of the lecture, you will read a number of questions about what you have heard. According to the information provided in the lecture, select the best answer for each question from among the four choices.
content.question: Bei welcher Gelegenheit entstanden die meisten M채rchen?

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
